editorial.title: Pralognan-la-Vanoise
content: Located in Pralognan-la-Vanoise, Madame Vacances- Résidence Les Jardins de la Vanoise is in the mountains. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Lac de la Rosiere and Vanoise National Park, while Maison de la Vanoise and Cinema Les Bruyeres are cultural highlights. Skateway Forum and La Folie Douce are also worth visiting. Fishing offers a great chance to get out on the surrounding water, or you can seek out an adventure with hiking/biking trails, rock climbing, and ziplining nearby. Guests love the residence's central location.

header.text: Madame Vacances- Résidence Les Jardins de la Vanoise

content.text: Enjoy your visit to Pralognan-la-Vanoise with a stay at Madame Vacances- Résidence Les Jardins de la Vanoise. Guests can keep active with onsite downhill skiing and snowboarding. Fellow travelers say great things about the overall value and WiFi.

primary.value: English, French
Property is professionally cleaned
Disinfectant is used to clean the property
High-touch surfaces are cleaned and disinfected
Sheets and towels are washed at 60°C/140°F or hotter
Social distancing measures in place
This information is provided by our partners.

content.text:
• Deposit: EUR 400 per accommodation, per stay
  • Cleaning deposit: EUR 205 per week
You'll be asked to pay the following charges by the property at check-in or check-out:
• A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 0.65 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age.

• Housekeeping is available for an additional fee
  • TV service is available for an extra charge of EUR 9 per day
• Pets are allowed for an extra charge of EUR 35 per pet, per week
• Covered self parking costs EUR 49 per week

This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.

The property is professionally cleaned; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F.

Social distancing measures are in place.
